title: Riot partnership with marvel to make their comics lmao gg
body:
GG this thing is gonna be riddled with left politics and stupid SJW crap. Like the first lil bit shown, u get a ashe with no chest >.> and looks to be mostly female cast. Dont get me wrong tho. if the story is great and the writing is good I will buy this, but I won't be surprised if its trash :/. I really hope league of legends writing team is part of the making.
https://www.theverge.com/2018/11/19/18099147/league-of-legends-marvel-comics-game-lore-riot
